thread.title: A look at the Red Sox’ infield situation for next season
thread.title_full: A look at the Red Sox’ infield situation for next season | Boston Herald

author: Jason Mastrodonato
title: A look at the Red Sox’ infield situation for next season
text:
A look at the Red Sox’ infield situation for next season:
HOLDOVERS
2B Dustin Pedroia
Opening Day age: 32
2015 key stats: 425 PA, 12 HR, 2 SB, 38 BB, 51 K, .291 AVG., .797 OPS
Contract status: Owed $13 million in 2016; under contract through 2021.
SS Xander Bogaerts
Opening Day age: 23
2015 key stats: 654 PA, 7 HR, 10 SB, 101 K, .320 AVG.
Contract status: Not eligible for arbitration, owed about $550,000.
3B Pablo Sandoval
Opening Day age: 29
2015 key stats: 505 PA, 10 HR, 25 BB, 73 K, .245 AVG., .658 OPS
Contract status: Owed $17M in 2016 (under contract through 2019, $17M team option in 2020).
1B (?) Hanley Ramirez
Opening Day age: 32
2015 key stats: 430 PA, 19 HR, 6 SB, 21 BB, 71 K, .249 AVG, .717 OPS
Contract status: Owed $22M in 2016 (under contract through 2018 with $22M vesting option 2019).
1B/3B Travis Shaw
Opening Day age: 25
2015 key stats: 248 PA, 13 HR, 18 BB, 57 K, .274 AVG, .822 OPS
Contract status: Not yet arbitration eligible, due about $550,000.
UTIL Brock Holt
Opening Day age: 27
2015 key stats: 509 PA, 2 HR, 8 SB, 46 BB, 97 K, .280 AVG, .727 OPS
Contract status: Not yet arbitration eligible, due about $550,000.
UTIL Josh Rutledge
Opening Day age: 26
2015 key stats: 85 PA, 1 HR, 5 BB, 26 K, .284 AVG, .671 OPS
Contract status: Not yet arbritration eligible, due about $550,000.
UTIL Devin Marrero
Opening Day age: 25
2015 key stats: 56 PA, 1 HR, 2 SB, 3 BB, 19 K, .226 AVG, .551 OPS
Contract status: Not yet arbritration eligible, due about $500,000.
IN THE SYSTEM
2B Yoan Moncada
363 PA, 8 HR, 49 SB, 42 BB, 83 K, .278 AVG, .817 OPS (Single-A)
3B Rafael Devers
508 PA, 11 HR, 3 SB, 24 BB, 84 K, .288 AVG, .773 OPS (Single-A)
SS Javier Guerra
477 PA, 15 HR, 7 SB, 30 BB, 112 K, .279 AVG, .778 OPS (Single-A)
TOP POTENTIAL TARGETS
1B Chris Davis
Orioles: 670 PA, 47 HR, 2 SB, 84 BB, 208 K, .262 AVG, .923 OPS
UTIL Juan Uribe
Mets: 397 PA, 14 HR, 2 SB, 34 BB, 80 K, .253 AVG, .737 OPS
